issue.title: Github data scraping for issue status
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13695](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13695). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13695?focusedCommentId=17405490) by David Dali Susanibar Arce (dsusanibara):*
GITHUB:

1. get workflows
https://api.github.com/repos/ursacomputing/crossbow/actions/workflows

2. workflow - branch:
https://api.github.com/repos/ursacomputing/crossbow/actions/workflows/4855680/runs?branch=nightly-2021-08-26-0-github-test-r-linux-rchk

3. get logs by action

AZURE:

1. pipeline:
https://dev.azure.com/ursacomputing/crossbow/_apis/pipelines?api-version=6.0-preview.1

2. branch status
https://dev.azure.com/ursacomputing/crossbow/_apis/build/status/1?api-version=6.0-preview.1&branchName=nightly-2021-08-26-0-azure-conda-osx-clang-py38

3. logs
https://dev.azure.com/ursacomputing/crossbow/_apis/build/latest/1?api-version=6.0-preview.1&branchName=nightly-2021-08-26-0-azure-conda-osx-clang-py38
